properties.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
properties.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued January 31 at 1:48PM PST until February 2 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph.
Wave heights 2 to 4 feet.

* WHERE...Pyramid Lake.

* WHEN...From 10 AM to 7 PM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone
to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until
conditions improve.
properties.instruction:
Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a
sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing
boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

NWSheadline: LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 7 PM PST SUNDAY FOR PYRAMID LAKE
